Title: Now, Go in Peace

Verses.29:
Lord [+], now let Your servant go in peace. [*]
	You have kept Your promise.
Verses.30: For my eyes have seen Your salvation, [*]
Verses.31: which You prepared in the sight of all people.
Verses.32:
A light of revelation for the nations, [*]
	and the glory of Your people Israel.
